00070 CMPIStatus OSBase_RouteUsesEndpointProviderEnumInstanceNames(CMPIInstanceMI *mi,
00071                                                              const CMPIContext *ctx,
00072                                                              const CMPIResult *rslt,
00073                                                              const CMPIObjectPath *ref)
00074 {
00075     _OSBASE_TRACE(1, ("--- %s CMPI EnumInstanceNames() called", _ClassName));
00076 
00077     CMPIStatus rc    = {CMPI_RC_OK, NULL}; // Return status of CIM operations.
00078     int        cmdrc = 0;                  // To handle errors received
00079                                            // from external functions.
00080 
00081     // Get association instances 1toN.
00082     cmdrc = _assoc_create_inst_1toN(_broker, ctx, rslt, ref, _ClassName,
00083                                     _RefLeftClass, _RefRightClass,
00084                                     _RefLeft, _RefRight, 1, 0, &rc);
00085     if(cmdrc != 0) {
00086         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, &rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00087                              "Could not get association instances.");
00088         if(rc.msg != NULL) {
00089             _OSBASE_TRACE(1, ("--- %s CMPI EnumInstanceNames() failed: %s",
00090                               _ClassName, CMGetCharPtr(rc.msg)));
00091         } else {
00092             _OSBASE_TRACE(1, ("--- %s CMPI EnumInstanceNames() failed",
00093                               _ClassName));
00094         }
00095         goto out;
00096     }
00097 
00098  out:
00099     CMReturnDone(rslt);
00100 
00101     _OSBASE_TRACE(1, ("--- %s CMPI EnumInstanceNames() exited", _ClassName));
00102     return rc;
00103 }

00144 CMPIStatus OSBase_RouteUsesEndpointProviderGetInstance(CMPIInstanceMI *mi,
00145                                                        const CMPIContext *ctx,
00146                                                        const CMPIResult *rslt,
00147                                                        const CMPIObjectPath *cop,
00148                                                        const char **properties)
00149 {
00150     _OSBASE_TRACE(1, ("--- %s CMPI GetInstance() called", _ClassName));
00151 
00152     CMPIStatus    rc = {CMPI_RC_OK, NULL}; // Return status of CIM operations.
00153     CMPIInstance *ci = NULL;               // Class instance.
00154 
00155     // Get association instance.
00156     ci = _assoc_get_inst(_broker, ctx, cop, _ClassName, _RefLeft,
00157                          _RefRight, &rc);
00158     if(ci == NULL) {
00159         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, &rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00160                              "Could not get association instance.");
00161         if(rc.msg != NULL) {
00162             _OSBASE_TRACE(1, ("--- %s CMPI GetInstance() failed: %s",
00163                               _ClassName, CMGetCharPtr(rc.msg)));
00164         } else {
00165             _OSBASE_TRACE(1, ("--- %s CMPI GetInstance() failed",
00166                               _ClassName));
00167         }
00168         goto out;
00169     }
00170     CMReturnInstance(rslt, ci);
00171 
00172  out:
00173     CMReturnDone(rslt);
00174 
00175     _OSBASE_TRACE(1, ("--- %s CMPI GetInstance() exited", _ClassName));
00176     return rc;
00177 }

00282 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00283 CMPIStatus OSBase_RouteUsesEndpointProviderAssociators(CMPIAssociationMI *mi,
00284                                                        const CMPIContext *ctx,
00285                                                        const CMPIResult *rslt,
00286                                                        const CMPIObjectPath *cop,
00287                                                        const char *assocClass,
00288                                                        const char *resultClass,
00289                                                        const char *role,
00290                                                        const char *resultRole,
00291                                                        const char **propertyList)
00292 {
00293     _OSBASE_TRACE(1, ("--- %s CMPI Associators() called", _ClassName));
00294 
00295     CMPIObjectPath *op   = NULL;               // Object path instance
00296                                                // (assocClass).
00297     CMPIObjectPath *rcop = NULL;               // Object path instance
00298                                                // (resultClass).
00299     CMPIStatus      rc   = {CMPI_RC_OK, NULL}; // Return status of CIM
00300                                                // operations.
00301 
00302     // Creating objectPath of this class.
00303     if(assocClass) {
00304         op = CMNewObjectPath(_broker, CMGetCharPtr(CMGetNameSpace(cop, &rc)),
00305                              _ClassName, &rc);
00306         if(op == NULL) {
00307             CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, &rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00308                                  "Create CMPIObjectPath failed (assocClass).");
00309             _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- %s CMPI Associators() failed: %s",
00310                               _ClassName, CMGetCharPtr(rc.msg)));
00311             goto out;
00312         }
00313     }
00314 
00315     // If "assocClass" is defined and "op" is not of type "assocClass".
00316     if((assocClass != NULL) &&
00317        (CMClassPathIsA(_broker, op, assocClass, &rc) == 0)) {
00318         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, &rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00319                              "Invalid assocClass.");
00320         _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- %s CMPI Associatoners() failed: %s",
00321                           _ClassName, CMGetCharPtr(rc.msg)));
00322         goto out;
00323     }
00324 
00325     // Check parameters.
00326     if(_assoc_check_parameter_const(_broker, cop, _RefLeft, _RefRight,
00327                                     _RefLeftClass, _RefRightClass,
00328                                     resultClass, role, resultRole,
00329                                     &rc) == 0) {
00330         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, &rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00331                              "Invalid parameters: association is not "  \
00332                              "responsible for this request");
00333         _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- %s CMPI Associators() failed: %s",
00334                           _ClassName, CMGetCharPtr(rc.msg)));
00335         goto out;
00336     }
00337 
00338     // Creating resultClass objectPath.
00339     if(resultClass) {
00340         rcop = CMNewObjectPath(_broker,
00341                                CMGetCharPtr(CMGetNameSpace(cop, &rc)),
00342                                resultClass, &rc);
00343         if(rcop == NULL) {
00344             CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, &rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00345                                  "Create CMPIObjectPath failed "        \
00346                                  "(resultClass).");
00347             _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- %s CMPI Associators() failed: %s",
00348                               _ClassName, CMGetCharPtr(rc.msg)));
00349             goto out;
00350         }
00351 
00352         // If "rcop" is not of type "_RefRightClass" and "_RefLeftClass".
00353         if((CMClassPathIsA(_broker, rcop, _RefRightClass, &rc) == 0) &&
00354            (CMClassPathIsA(_broker, rcop, _RefLeftClass, &rc) == 0)) {
00355             CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, &rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00356                                  "Invalid resultClass.");
00357             _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- %s CMPI Associators() failed: %s",
00358                               _ClassName, CMGetCharPtr(rc.msg)));
00359             goto out;
00360         }
00361     }
00362 
00363     // Get assoc instances.
00364     rc = _assoc_RouteUsesEndpoint(_broker, ctx, rslt, cop, resultClass,
00365                                   ATYPE_ASSOC, &rc);
00366     if(rc.rc != CMPI_RC_OK) {
00367         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, &rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00368                              "Could not get association instances.");
00369         if(rc.msg != NULL)  {
00370             _OSBASE_TRACE(1, ("--- %s CMPI Associators() failed: %s",
00371                               _ClassName, CMGetCharPtr(rc.msg)));
00372         } else {
00373             _OSBASE_TRACE(1, ("--- %s CMPI Associators() failed.",
00374                               _ClassName));
00375         }
00376         goto out;
00377     }
00378 
00379  out:
00380     CMReturnDone(rslt);
00381 
00382     _OSBASE_TRACE(1, ("--- %s CMPI Associators() exited", _ClassName));
00383     return rc;
00384 }

00388 CMPIStatus OSBase_RouteUsesEndpointProviderAssociatorNames(CMPIAssociationMI *mi,
00389                                                            const CMPIContext *ctx,
00390                                                            const CMPIResult *rslt,
00391                                                            const CMPIObjectPath *cop,
00392                                                            const char *assocClass,
00393                                                            const char *resultClass,
00394                                                            const char *role,
00395                                                            const char *resultRole)
00396 {
00397     _OSBASE_TRACE(1, ("--- %s CMPI AssociatorNames() called", _ClassName));
00398 
00399     CMPIObjectPath *op   = NULL;               // Object path instance
00400                                                // (assocClass).
00401     CMPIObjectPath *rcop = NULL;               // Object path instance
00402                                                // (resultClass).
00403     CMPIStatus      rc   = {CMPI_RC_OK, NULL}; // Return status of CIM
00404                                                // operations.
00405 
00406     // Creating assocClass objectPath.
00407     if(assocClass) {
00408         op = CMNewObjectPath(_broker, CMGetCharPtr(CMGetNameSpace(cop, &rc)),
00409                              _ClassName, &rc);
00410         if(op == NULL) {
00411             CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, &rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00412                                  "Create CMPIObjectPath failed (assocClass).");
00413             _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- %s CMPI AssociatorNames() failed: %s",
00414                               _ClassName, CMGetCharPtr(rc.msg)));
00415             goto out;
00416         }
00417     }
00418 
00419     // If "assocClass" is defined and "op" is not of type "assocClass".
00420     if((assocClass != NULL) &&
00421        (CMClassPathIsA(_broker, op, assocClass, &rc) == 0)) {
00422         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, &rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00423                              "Invalid assocClass.");
00424         _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- %s CMPI AssociatonerNames() failed: %s",
00425                           _ClassName, CMGetCharPtr(rc.msg)));
00426         goto out;
00427     }
00428 
00429     // Check parameters.
00430     if(_assoc_check_parameter_const(_broker, cop, _RefLeft, _RefRight,
00431                                     _RefLeftClass, _RefRightClass,
00432                                     resultClass, role, resultRole,
00433                                     &rc) == 0) {
00434         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, &rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00435                              "Invalid parameters: association is not "  \
00436                              "responsible for this request");
00437         _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- %s CMPI AssociatorNames() failed: %s",
00438                           _ClassName, CMGetCharPtr(rc.msg)));
00439         goto out;
00440     }
00441 
00442     // Creating resultClass objectPath.
00443     if(resultClass) {
00444         rcop = CMNewObjectPath(_broker,
00445                                CMGetCharPtr(CMGetNameSpace(cop, &rc)),
00446                                resultClass, &rc);
00447         if(rcop == NULL) {
00448             CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, &rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00449                                  "Create CMPIObjectPath failed "        \
00450                                  "(resultClass).");
00451             _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- %s CMPI AssociatorNames() failed: %s",
00452                               _ClassName, CMGetCharPtr(rc.msg)));
00453             goto out;
00454         }
00455 
00456         // If "rcop" is not of type "_RefRightClass" and "_RefLeftClass".
00457         if((CMClassPathIsA(_broker, rcop, _RefRightClass, &rc) == 0) &&
00458            (CMClassPathIsA(_broker, rcop, _RefLeftClass, &rc) == 0)) {
00459             CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, &rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00460                                  "Invalid resultClass.");
00461             _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- %s CMPI AssociatorNames() failed: %s",
00462                               _ClassName, CMGetCharPtr(rc.msg)));
00463             goto out;
00464         }
00465     }
00466 
00467     // Get assoc objectPaths.
00468     rc = _assoc_RouteUsesEndpoint(_broker, ctx, rslt, cop, resultClass,
00469                                   ATYPE_ASSOCN, &rc);
00470     if(rc.rc != CMPI_RC_OK) {
00471         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, &rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00472                              "Could not get association instances.");
00473         if(rc.msg != NULL)  {
00474             _OSBASE_TRACE(1, ("--- %s CMPI AssociatorNames() failed: %s",
00475                               _ClassName, CMGetCharPtr(rc.msg)));
00476         } else {
00477             _OSBASE_TRACE(1, ("--- %s CMPI AssociatorNames() failed",
00478                               _ClassName));
00479         }
00480         goto out;
00481     }
00482 
00483  out:
00484     CMReturnDone(rslt);
00485 
00486     _OSBASE_TRACE(1, ("--- %s CMPI AssociatorNames() exited", _ClassName));
00487     return rc;
00488 }

00491 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00492 CMPIStatus OSBase_RouteUsesEndpointProviderReferences(CMPIAssociationMI *mi,
00493                                                       const CMPIContext *ctx,
00494                                                       const CMPIResult *rslt,
00495                                                       const CMPIObjectPath *cop,
00496                                                       const char *assocClass,
00497                                                       const char *role,
00498                                                       const char **propertyList)
00499 {
00500     _OSBASE_TRACE(1, ("--- %s CMPI References() called", _ClassName));
00501 
00502     CMPIObjectPath *op = NULL;               // Object path instance
00503                                              // (assocClass).
00504     CMPIStatus      rc = {CMPI_RC_OK, NULL}; // Return status of CIM operations.
00505 
00506     // Creating assocClass objectPath.
00507     if(assocClass) {
00508         op = CMNewObjectPath(_broker, CMGetCharPtr(CMGetNameSpace(cop, &rc)),
00509                              _ClassName, &rc);
00510         if(op == NULL) {
00511             CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, &rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00512                                  "Create CMPIObjectPath failed (assocClass).");
00513             _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- %s CMPI References() failed: %s",
00514                               _ClassName, CMGetCharPtr(rc.msg)));
00515             goto out;
00516         }
00517     }
00518 
00519     // If "assocClass" is defined and "op" is not of type "assocClass".
00520     if((assocClass != NULL) &&
00521        (CMClassPathIsA(_broker, op, assocClass, &rc) == 0)) {
00522         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, &rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00523                              "Invalid assocClass.");
00524         _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- %s CMPI References() failed: %s",
00525                           _ClassName, CMGetCharPtr(rc.msg)));
00526         goto out;
00527     }
00528 
00529     // Check parameters.
00530     if(_assoc_check_parameter_const(_broker, cop, _RefLeft, _RefRight,
00531                                     _RefLeftClass, _RefRightClass,
00532                                     NULL, role, NULL, &rc) == 0) {
00533         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, &rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00534                              "Invalid parameters: association is not " \
00535                              "responsible for this request");
00536         _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- %s CMPI References() failed: %s",
00537                           _ClassName, CMGetCharPtr(rc.msg)));
00538         goto out;
00539     }
00540 
00541     // Get references instances.
00542     rc = _assoc_RouteUsesEndpoint(_broker, ctx, rslt, cop, assocClass,
00543                                   ATYPE_REFER, &rc);
00544     if(rc.rc != CMPI_RC_OK) {
00545         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, &rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00546                              "Could not get association instances.");
00547         if(rc.msg != NULL)  {
00548             _OSBASE_TRACE(1, ("--- %s CMPI References() failed: %s",
00549                               _ClassName, CMGetCharPtr(rc.msg)));
00550         } else {
00551             _OSBASE_TRACE(1, ("--- %s CMPI References() failed",
00552                               _ClassName));
00553         }
00554         goto out;
00555     }
00556 
00557  out:
00558     CMReturnDone(rslt);
00559     _OSBASE_TRACE(1, ("--- %s CMPI References() exited", _ClassName));
00560     return rc;
00561 }

00594         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, &rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00595                              "Invalid assocClass.");
00596         _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- %s CMPI ReferenceNames() failed: %s",
00597                           _ClassName, CMGetCharPtr(rc.msg)));
00598         goto out;
00599     }
00600 
00601     // Check parameters.
00602     if(_assoc_check_parameter_const(_broker, cop, _RefLeft, _RefRight,
00603                                     _RefLeftClass, _RefRightClass,
00604                                     NULL, role, NULL, &rc) == 0) {
00605         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, &rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00606                              "Invalid parameters: association is not " \
00607                              "responsible for this request");
00608         _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- %s CMPI ReferenceNames() failed: %s",
00609                           _ClassName, CMGetCharPtr(rc.msg)));
00610         goto out;
00611     }
00612 
00613     // Get references objectPaths.
00614     rc = _assoc_RouteUsesEndpoint(_broker, ctx, rslt, cop, assocClass,
00615                                   ATYPE_REFERN, &rc);
00616     if(rc.rc != CMPI_RC_OK) {
00617         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, &rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00618                              "Could not get association instances.");
00619         if(rc.msg != NULL)  {
00620             _OSBASE_TRACE(1, ("--- %s CMPI ReferenceNameNames() failed: %s",
00621                               _ClassName, CMGetCharPtr(rc.msg)));
00622         } else {
00623             _OSBASE_TRACE(1, ("--- %s CMPI ReferenceNameNames() failed",
00624                               _ClassName));
00625         }
00626         goto out;
00627     }
00628 
00629  out:
00630     CMReturnDone(rslt);
00631 
00632     _OSBASE_TRACE(1, ("--- %s CMPI ReferenceNames() exited", _ClassName));
00633     return rc;
00634 }
